introduction: Welcome to the Environmental Engineering Lab

experiments.name: Determination of Break-Point Chloride demand in water
Determination of Dissolved Oxygen in water

UG: B.E/B.Tech in Civil Engineering and Environment Engineering

objective: This lab provides the knowledge on tests used to analyse the physio-chemical and bacteriological properties of water and explains the various method followed in the test along with its suitability as a drinking water.

courseAlignment.description: Following are the courses in which one can come across the theory connected to the experiments in this lab :
universities: Environmental Engineering - National Institute of Technology Karnataka Surathkal, APJ Abdul Kalam Technological University, Goa University
Environmental Engineering II - APJ Abdul Kalam Technological University
Environmental Engineering Laboratory - National Institute of Technology Karnataka Surathkal, APJ Abdul Kalam Technological University
Water and Waste Water Analysis Laboratory - Anna University
